name: I'll always remember you
description:
Today I stumbled upon a letter you wrote me 3 years ago. It was in my shoe box that was sitting under a pile of books. I remembered that day clearly. It was our one month anniversary. You hugged and kissed me and said, "I know, I know...we have email and texts message, but I want to, well I thought, anyway, don't read it now, do it when you get home". You were a bit embarrassed, I thought it was sweet. I could hardly sleep that night, I was so happy to have found you.

Yes, I can still feel every word and I cherish every single one of them. Rest easy, my love.

With this image I wanted to capture the feeling of missing someone so much, that it hurts.

This piece (as static) also received a merit award in 2019 3x3 publication.
